summary: Lovers Marianne and Jean-Paul spend their vacation in a villa on the French Riviera near St-Tropez. Marianne invites her former lover, Harry, and his teenage daughter to stay. Tension rises between them, especially when Jean-Paul seduces Penelope.
cast: Alain Delon|Romy Schneider|Maurice Ronet|Jane Birkin|Paul Crauchet|Suzie Jaspard|Maddly Bamy|Thierry Chabert|Steve Eckardt|Ruth Price|St√©phanie Fugain
title: La piscina
